name: The Signature Travel Skincare Set
about: What it is:A set of effortless on-the-go skincare essentials that deliver visibly healthy, glowing, and hydrated skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Dullness.Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan..What Else You Need to Know:Is your skin stressed, tired, and thirsty? These products nourish and hydrate, leaving skin looking renewed, radiant, and ready for anything..This Set Contains:- 0.16 oz/ 5 g Lip Butter Balm in Vanilla.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: Lip Butter Balm in Vanilla: .Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Vanillin, Tocopherol, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Mica, Bht. ...Jet Lag™ Deep Hydration Serum: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Squalane, Glycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Polyester-5, Sodium Hyaluronate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Sodium Pca, Panthenol, Ceramide Np, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Niacinamide, Acetyl Glucosamine, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Pca, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Phenylalanine, Histidine, Sodium Lactate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propylene Glycol...Jet Lag™ Mask: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diheptyl Succinate, Niacinamide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Sorbitan Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bisabolol, Allantion, Physalis Angulata Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Castanea Sativa (Chestnut) Seed Extract, Panthenol, Phytosphingosine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Peg-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol...Super Amino Gel Cleanser™: .Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Pca, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Glycine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sea Salt/Maris Sal/Sel Marin, Sodium Pca, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Lactate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance/Parfum, Limonene. ..Jet Lag™ Overnight Eye Serum: .Glycerin, Water/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Pentylene Glycol, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Propanediol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Ceramide Np, Bisabolol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Phospholipids, Retinyl Linoleate, Retinol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Gluconolactone, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Lip Butter Balm Vanilla: .-Apply as needed throughout the day, whenever lips need extra hydration. .-The balm can be used under or over lipstick...Jet Lag Deep Hydration Serum: .-Smooth over cleansed skin. .-Follow with your favorite serum and moisturizer if desired...Jet Lag Mask: .-On cleansed, dry skin apply a thin, even layer with fingertips. .-This may be used under and over the eye area. .-Leave for ten minutes for maximum hydration. .-Blot with a cloth if necessary—no need to rinse...Summer Fridays Super Amino Gel Cleanser™: .-Dampen skin, then dispense into palm. .-Massage over face in circular motions, avoiding eye area. .-Rinse with water. .-Pat skin dry. ..Jet Lag Overnight Eye Serum: .-In the evening, gently apply a small amount around the contour of each eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these products. I purchased them to take them with me during my travels but I ended love loving them so much that I using them daily and will soon go back to buy the regular sizes. It’s made the wrinkles around my eyes a bbit smoother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The hydration my skin has been getting after using this for a few weeks is amazing! I think it’s the perfect travel size! I’m definitely going to be rebuying as gifts! I think this is the perfect skincare set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The lipgloss was missing from my set. I had to go back in store to return it, and when i did it was sold out online and in store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE these products!!! Perfect for my dry skin!!!
